subject: Basketball
Officiating (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. said that the officials Ed Malloy, John Goble and Violet Palmer missed a foul by Charlotte’s Michael Kidd-Gilchrist against Toronto’s Andrea Bargnani Wednesday.
snippet: The N.B.A. said that the officials Ed Malloy, John Goble and Violet Palmer missed a foul by Charlotte’s Michael Kidd-Gilchrist against Toronto’s Andrea Bargnani Wednesday.
